name: KShow123 DarkMode v1.00
description: Dark/Night mode for Kshow123.net and Kshow123.com
additional_info:
Found a style that had a few blemishes and hasn't been updated for months so I edited it to my liking.

Changelog:

v1.00:

- Reinserted logo for easier access to home page
- Unnecessary subtext above video player removed 
- Reinserted the links portion that was previously hidden
- Made the link hosts name visible by changing color from original
- Fixed the background on the stars/rating to fit with dark style

//

Original style by user "Sazuko"
https://userstyles.org/styles/140042/kshow123
